definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: be red (on format. cf. Lag:BN 83 cf. 120)—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Pf. 3 pl. [[אָֽדְמוּ]] ruddy, of Nazirites La 4:7;

definitions.title: Pu.
definitions.body: Pt. reddened, dyed red, [[מְאָדָּם]] Na 2:4 (of shield), [[מְאָדָּמִים]] of rams’ skins Ex 25:5, Ex 26:14, Ex 35:7, Ex 35:23, Ex 36:19, Ex 39:34 (all P).

definitions.title: Hithp.
definitions.body: Impf. redden, grow or look red, [[יִתְאַדָָּם]] Pr 23:31 ( of wine);

definitions.title: Hiph.
definitions.body: Impf. emit (show) redness (cf. Lag:BN 120) [[יַאְדִּימוּ כַתּוֹלָע]] Is 1:18 (of sins) i.e. be glaring, flagrant (cf. also v:Is 1:15).
